price: As for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have made their deeds appealing to them, so they wander blindly.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
